#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,j,t;
	cin>>t;
	string s,res=" ";
	while(t--)
	{
		res="";
		cin>>s;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();)
		{
			j = ((s[i]-'0') *10) + (s[i+1]-'0');
			i+=2;
			if(j!=32 && (j<65 || (j>90 && j<97) || j>122))
			{
				j=j*10 + (s[i]-'0');
				i++;
			}	
			char a = (char)j;
//			printf("%c\n",a);
			res = res + a;
		}
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
